overview:
Gabe Bevilacqua is an accomplished product and business leader with experience at both ground-floor start-ups and global brands in software, media, and online marketing. Bevilacqua is a Founder and the VP of Business Development at Rallyverse, a social media startup in New York City.

Prior to joining Rallyverse, Gabe spent six years at Microsoft, where he held a number of product leadership roles for Microsoftâ€™s ad platform products, most recently as the Director of Product Management and Product Marketing for the Atlas Advertiser Suite. Prior to Microsoft, Gabe was the Global Brand Manager for Guinness World Records, responsible for sales and marketing in the US, as well as digital products globally.

Gabe is a graduate of Princeton University and has an MBA from Columbia Business School. He lives in New York City with his wife and daughter.
